meanings.definition: Not serious or solemn in manner or attitude.
meanings.sent1: She had a nonserious approach to her schoolwork, often joking around during class.
meanings.sent2: The party had a nonserious atmosphere, with everyone laughing and having a good time.
meanings.sent3: His nonserious behavior at the meeting made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The nonserious tone of the conversation lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent5: The nonserious attitude of the team captain helped ease the tension before the game.

meanings.sent1: The nonserious task of organizing the office supplies was quickly completed.
meanings.sent2: The argument seemed nonserious, focusing on trivial matters.
meanings.sent3: Her nonserious complaint about the weather made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The nonserious nature of the competition made it more enjoyable for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The nonserious decision to wear mismatched socks added a touch of fun to her outfit.
